question: The basic WTO principle with reference to trade barriers is that:
option1: Trade barriers can be imposed by any country that believes it will benefit from such trade barriers
option2: Trade Barriers should be lowered equally and without discrimination for all member countries
option3: Trade Barriers can be imposed if a majority of the members of the WTO agree
option4: Trade Barriers should be the same in all member countries so that the result is equivalent to free trade
answer: Trade Barriers should be lowered equally and without discrimination for all member countries
